selected_quotes: Image of the Week: This 21-year-old man had itching and tearing in both eyes after a #stemcell transplant.
A 21-year-old man with itching and tearing in both eyes 1 month after hematopoietic stem-cell transplantation.
Images in Clinical Medicine: Acute Ocular Graft-versus-Host Disease
Powerful image. Now hear the voice of a man who was harmed by an unproven stem cell treatment in this podcast.
One thing I learned in my study of the economics of #cordblood is that cord blood stem cell transplants have lower rate…
